trigger.title: Trigger: Bee Nest Destroyed
trigger.description: Triggers when the player breaks a bee nest or beehive.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

block.title: Block
block.description: Checks the block that was destroyed. Accepts block IDs.

item.title: Item
item.description: The item used to break the block.

num_bees_inside.title: Number of Bees Inside
num_bees_inside.description: The number of bees that were inside the bee nest/beehive before it was broken.
